message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking $20,000 for it. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can you meet me there?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $20,000 represents the value of this product, I'm willing to come down to $17,000.  I believe this offer reflects a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $17,000 is still a bit steep for me. I'm thinking more along the lines of $14,000. Can we meet in the middle?
